body: Though I do not understand, I like the way the scenes were drawn, especially page 40, which was the most important or 'climax' page. For me at least. But the plot, though again, I cannot understand, seems really nice. I do not really like the scene where he punches and slaps the face of Pit after, because he said something. (from what I understand looking at the drawings)  I think that scene could have been better if he was less of a dick. I will wait for the English translation (if there's any) before reviewing this work so I can make a fair judgement. Still a 10/10 fap though. Very nice.
10/10 made my pee pee mega hard would read again lOL XD
